definitions.definition: the general health, happiness and safety of a person, an animal or a group

examples.text: We are concerned about the child's welfare.
The government's policies will promote the welfare of all citizens.
Animal welfare groups want this practice banned altogether.

definitions.definition: practical or financial help that is provided, often by the government, for people or animals that need it

examples.text: The state is still the main provider of welfare.
There must be adequate welfare provision for people who are unable to work.

definitions.definition: money that the government pays regularly to people who are poor, unemployed, sick, etc.
